title: Public civil servant and inflation in France
text:
Public civil servant and inflation in France
In the file fonctionnaires_pauvres.py we investigated the evolution of the salary of public civil servant in France through the “Point d’indice” evolution.
Sources are: - inflation : https://www.insee.fr/fr/statistiques/serie/001763852#Telechargement - point d’indice: https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Point_d%27indice_salarial_en_France
